seriesJson.title: Medical research
seriesJson.description: This series explores current developments in research in the fields of the behavioral sciences and medicine.

node.title: Viruses
node.description: This program focuses on viruses and the study of them. Guests are John F. Enders, MD and Jerome T. Syverton, MD.

node.title: Neurological and muscular disease
node.description: This program discusses various neurological and muscular diseases. Guests are Hans H. Reese, MD; Francis M. Forster, MD; Roger J. Williams, Ph.D; J. Morrison Brady, MD; and Ade T. Milhorat, MD.

node.title: Diabetes, part 2
node.description: This program, the second of two parts, focuses on diabetes and its treatment methods. Guests are F.D.W. Lukens, MD; Garfield G. Duncan, MD; and Randall G. Sprague, MD.
